activity.title: Authentication Activity Log
about.title: About ReadSpace
about.application.title: About the Application
about.application.p1: ReadSpace is a simple web-based library application designed to help users browse, search, and manage a small library catalog digitally. This application provides an easy way to explore book collections, view detailed book information, and save favorite books for future reference.
about.application.p2: ReadSpace is suitable for small libraries, study groups, or academic projects that require a lightweight and user-friendly digital catalog system.
about.target.title: Target Users
about.target.students: Students who want to search books and add books to their favorite list.
about.target.guests: Guests who want to browse and check book details.
about.target.admin: Library staff / Admin who want to manage and add new books.
about.features.title: Menus & Features
about.features.book_list_desc: Displays all available books in the library catalog.
about.features.book_detail_desc: Shows detailed information about selected books.
about.features.favorite_desc: Allows users to save and view favorite books.
about.features.search_desc: Enables users to search for specific books.
about.features.auth_desc: Allows users to create accounts and access more features.
